comment:
Extracted Variables:
- Let x be the number of palladium-heavy catalysts used.
- Let y be the number of platinum-heavy catalysts used.

Extracted Constraints:
- 15x + 20y \leq 450 (Platinum constraint)
- 25x + 14y \leq 390 (Palladium constraint)
- x \geq 0 (Non-negativity constraint)
- y \geq 0 (Non-negativity constraint)

Extracted Objective:
- Maximize 5x + 4y (Amount converted into carbon dioxide)
